title: Zero Waste Asia Conference 2024
description: Regional gathering of practitioners, policymakers, and advocates to share best practices and strategies for zero waste transitions

title: Community Composting Workshop - Bandung
description: Hands-on training for households and community groups on backyard composting, vermicomposting, and Takakura methods

title: Waste Bank Leadership Training
description: Capacity-building program for waste bank managers covering financial management, member engagement, and impact reporting

title: Plastic-Free Market Pop-Up
description: Weekend market featuring zero waste vendors, refill stations, and sustainable product demos

title: Youth Climate Action Forum
description: Interactive forum for young leaders to discuss zero waste solutions, circular economy, and climate justice

title: Corporate Zero Waste Roundtable
description: Private sector dialogue on implementing circular economy principles and waste reduction targets

title: World Cleanup Day Indonesia 2024
description: Nationwide cleanup and waste audit events coordinated across hundreds of locations

title: Zero Waste Business Summit
description: Two-day conference showcasing successful zero waste business models and circular economy innovations

title: Beach Cleanup & Marine Debris Workshop - Bali
description: Morning cleanup followed by afternoon session on monitoring protocols and data collection

title: Refill Station Network Launch - Surabaya
description: Grand opening of 15 new refill stations across Surabaya with demos and special promotions
